query.pigql: q = load "QADInvoice_SnapshotDB_test"; q1 = group q by 'DUE_DATE_Year';q1 = foreach q1 generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' as 'DUE_DATE_Year', avg('DUE_DATE_Year_new') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear';q1 = order q1 by 'DUE_DATE_Year' desc;q1 = limit q1 1;q2 = filter q by  {{column(Time_Year_1.selection,["Time_Year"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE_Year")}};q2 = group q2 by 'DUE_DATE_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' as 'Date_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('DUE_DATE_Year_new') as 'avg_DueDateYear';u = union q1,q2;u = group u by all;u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DueDateYear')> 3000 then 0 else (sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*-730 end) as 'Dayy_Difff';

q = load "QADInvoice_SnapshotDB_test";    q = filter q by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("STATE1")}};    q = filter q by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["Time_Week"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE_Week")}};    q = filter q by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("PRODUCT_NAME")}};    q = filter q by 'STATE1' in ["ACT", "NSW", "QLD", "SA", "TAS", "VIC", "WA"];    a = filter q by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in ["current week - {{cell(CYWeekStart.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks".."current week - {{cell(CYWeekEnd.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks"];    a = group a by ('DUE_DATE_Year','DUE_DATE_Week');    a = foreach a generate 'DUE_DATE_Week' as 'DUE_DATE_Week', "Current 52 Weeks List" as 'Time Period', sum('EXT_PRICE1') as 'sum_EXT_PRICE';       r = filter q by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in  ["current week - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks".."current week - {{cell(LYWeekEnd.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks"];    r = group r by ('DUE_DATE_Year','DUE_DATE_Week');    r = foreach r generate 'DUE_DATE_Week' as 'DUE_DATE_Week', "Last 52 Weeks List" as 'Time Period', sum('EXT_PRICE1') as 'sum_EXT_PRICE';     b = load "ScanData";    b = filter b by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("Market")}};    b = filter b by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["Time_Week"]).asEquality("Time_Week")}};    b = filter b by 'Measure' == "Value";    b = filter b by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("Product")}};    t = filter b by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in ["current week - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks".."current week - {{cell(LYWeekEnd.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks"];    t = group t by ('Time_Year','Time_Week');    t = foreach t generate 'Time_Week' as 'DUE_DATE_Week',"Last 52 Weeks Scan" as 'Time Period',  sum('Data_Value') as 'sum_EXT_PRICE';          x = filter b by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in ["current week - {{cell(CYWeekStart.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks".."current week - {{cell(CYWeekEnd.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks"];    x = group x by ('Time_Year','Time_Week');    x = foreach x generate 'Time_Week' as 'DUE_DATE_Week',"Current 52 Weeks Scan" as 'Time Period', sum('Data_Value') as 'sum_EXT_PRICE';          u = union a,r,t,x;    d = group u by ('DUE_DATE_Week','Time Period');    d = foreach d generate 'DUE_DATE_Week' as 'DUE_DATE_Week','Time Period' as 'Time Period', sum('sum_EXT_PRICE') as 'Amount';

q = load "QADInvoice_SnapshotDB_test"; q1 = group q by 'DUE_DATE_Year'; q1 = foreach q1 generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' as 'DUE_DATE_Year', avg('DUE_DATE_Year_new') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear'; q1 = order q1 by 'DUE_DATE_Year' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(Time_Year_1.selection,["Time_Year"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE_Year")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'DUE_DATE_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' as 'DUE_DATE_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('DUE_DATE_Year_new') as 'avg_DueDateYear'; u = union q1,q2; u = group u by all; u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DueDateYear')> 3000 then 53 else ((sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*52)+53 end) as 'Week_Diff';

q = load "QADInvoice_SnapshotDB_test"; q1 = group q by 'DUE_DATE_Year'; q1 = foreach q1 generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' as 'DUE_DATE_Year', avg('DUE_DATE_Year_new') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear'; q1 = order q1 by 'DUE_DATE_Year' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(Time_Year_1.selection,["DUE_DATE_Year"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE_Year")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'DUE_DATE_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' as 'DUE_DATE_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('DUE_DATE_Year_new') as 'avg_DueDateYear'; u = union q1,q2; u = group u by all;u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DueDateYear')> 3000 then 0 else (sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*1 end)  as 'Year_Diff';

m = load "Data_Format_1_15_Mar_2017";h = filter m by date('Week_Year', 'Week_Month','Week_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; k = filter m by date('Week_Year', 'Week_Month','Week_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; h=group h by ('Week_Year', 'Week_Week');h = foreach h generate 'Week_Year' + "~~~" + 'Week_Week' as 'Week_Year~~~Week_Week',"Current" as Type, sum('Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl') as 'sum_Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl';k=group k by ('Week_Year', 'Week_Week');k = foreach k generate 'Week_Year' + "~~~" + 'Week_Week' as 'Week_Year~~~Week_Week', sum('Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl') as 'sum_Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl',"Previous" as Type;i=union h,k;i=foreach i generate sum(sum_Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl) as sum_Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl,Type as Type,'Week_Year~~~Week_Week' as 'Week_Year~~~Week_Week';

q = load "ScanData";q= filter q by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("Market")}};q = filter q by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["DUE_DATE_Week"]).asEquality("Time_Week")}};q = filter q by 'Measure' == "Value";q= filter q by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("Product")}};f = filter q by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; f=group f by (Time_Year,Time_Week);f=foreach f generate 'Time_Year' + "~~~" + Time_Week as 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week', sum(Data_Value) as 'sum_Data_Value';u = load "QADInvoice_SnapshotDB_test";u= filter u by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("STATE1")}};u = filter u by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["DUE_DATE_Week"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE_Week")}};u= filter u by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("PRODUCT_NAME")}}; v = filter u by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];  v = group v by (DUE_DATE_Year, DUE_DATE_Week); v = foreach v generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' + "~~~" + 'DUE_DATE_Week' as 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week',  sum(EXT_PRICE_AUD) as sum_EXT_PRICE1;m = load "Data_Format_1_15_Mar_2017";m= filter m by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("Region")}};m= filter m by {{column(Sales_House_3.selection,["Sales_House"]).asEquality("Sales_House")}};m= filter m by {{column(ChannelSite_1_1.selection,["Channel_Site"]).asEquality("Channel_Site")}};m= filter m by {{column(AD_Format_1.selection,["Ad_Format"]).asEquality("Ad_Format")}};m= filter m by {{column(Medium_1_1.selection,["Medium"]).asEquality("Medium")}};m= filter m by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("Product")}};m = filter m by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["DUE_DATE_Week"]).asEquality("Week_Week")}}; h = filter m by date('Week_Year', 'Week_Month','Week_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; h=group h by ('Week_Year', 'Week_Week');h = foreach h generate 'Week_Year' + "~~~" + 'Week_Week' as 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week', sum('Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl') as 'sum_Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl';z=union f,v,h; z=group z by ('Time_Year~~~Time_Week'); z=foreach z generate 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week' as 'Time1_Year~~~Time1_Week',sum(sum_Data_Value) as Data_Value,sum(sum_Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl) as sum_Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl,sum(sum_EXT_PRICE1) as sum_EXT_PRICE1;e = filter m by date('Week_Year', 'Week_Month','Week_Day') in ["52 weeks ago".."current week"];e = group e by (Week_Year, Week_Week); e = foreach e generate 'Week_Year' + "~~~" + 'Week_Week' as 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week', sum('Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl') as 'sum_Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl';b = load "ScanData";b= filter b by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("Market")}};b= filter b by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("Product")}};b = filter b by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["DUE_DATE_Week"]).asEquality("Time_Week")}};t = filter b by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in ["52 weeks ago".."current week"]; t = group t by ('Time_Year','Time_Week'); t = foreach t generate 'Time_Year' + "~~~" + 'Time_Week' as 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week', sum(Data_Value) as 'sum_Data_Value'; l = load "QADInvoice_SnapshotDB_test";l= filter l by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("STATE1")}};l= filter l by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("PRODUCT_NAME")}};l = filter l by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["DUE_DATE_Week"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE_Week")}}; a = filter l by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in ["52 weeks ago".."current week"];  a = group a by ('DUE_DATE_Year','DUE_DATE_Week'); a = foreach a generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' + "~~~" + 'DUE_DATE_Week' as 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week',  sum('EXT_PRICE_AUD') as 'sum_EXT_PRICE1';o=union e,t,a; o=group o by ('Time_Year~~~Time_Week'); o=foreach o generate 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week' as 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week', sum(sum_Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl) as sum_Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl_o, sum(sum_Data_Value) as Data_Value_o,sum(sum_EXT_PRICE1) as sum_EXT_PRICE1_o; j=union z,o; j=foreach j generate (case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl_o) else sum(sum_Actual_Impressions_Ttl_Ppl) end) as 'Media weights',(case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_EXT_PRICE1_o) else sum(sum_EXT_PRICE1) end) as 'List Sales($)', (case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(Data_Value_o) else sum(Data_Value)  end) as 'Scan Sales($)',  (case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week' else 'Time1_Year~~~Time1_Week' end) as 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week'

q = load "QADInvoice_SnapshotDB_test";q = filter q by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("STATE1")}};q= filter q by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("PRODUCT_NAME")}};q = filter q by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["DUE_DATE_Week"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE_Week")}}; m = filter q by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in ["52 weeks ago".."current day"];x = filter q by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in  ["52 weeks ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"];d = group m by ('DUE_DATE_Week') full , x by ('DUE_DATE_Week');d = foreach d generate coalesce(m.'DUE_DATE_Week', x.'DUE_DATE_Week') as 'DUE_DATE_Week',first(m.'DUE_DATE_Year', x.'DUE_DATE_Year') as 'DUE_DATE_Year', coalesce(sum(m.'KG'), 0) as 'A', coalesce(sum(x.'KG'), 0) as 'B';d=foreach d generate DUE_DATE_Year + "~~~" + DUE_DATE_Week as 'DUE_DATE_Year~~~DUE_DATE_Week',A as 'Current List', B as 'Previous List';f = filter q by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; g = filter q by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"..  "current year - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];s = group f by ('DUE_DATE_Week') full, g by ('DUE_DATE_Week');s = foreach s generate coalesce(f.'DUE_DATE_Week', g.'DUE_DATE_Week') as 'DUE_DATE_Week',first(f.'DUE_DATE_Year', g.'DUE_DATE_Year') as 'DUE_DATE_Year', coalesce(sum(f.'KG'), 0) as 'A', coalesce(sum(g.'KG'), 0) as 'B';s=foreach s generate DUE_DATE_Year + "~~~" + DUE_DATE_Week as 'DUE_DATE1_Year~~~DUE_DATE1_Week',A as 'Current List 1', B as 'Previous List 1';j=union d,s;j=foreach j generate (case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum('Current List') else sum('Current List 1')  end) as 'Current List',(case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum('Previous List') else sum('Previous List 1')  end) as 'Previous List',(case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then 'DUE_DATE_Year~~~DUE_DATE_Week' else 'DUE_DATE1_Year~~~DUE_DATE1_Week'  end) as 'DUE_DATE_Year~~~DUE_DATE_Week';

q = load "ScanData";q= filter q by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("Product")}};q = filter q by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("Market")}};q = filter q by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["DUE_DATE_Week"]).asEquality("Time_Week")}};q = filter q by 'Measure' == "Value";m = filter q by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in ["52 weeks ago".."current day"];x = filter q by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in  ["52 weeks ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"];d = group x by ('Time_Week') , m by ('Time_Week');d = foreach d generate coalesce(m.'Time_Week', x.'Time_Week') as 'Time_Week',first(m.'Time_Year', x.'Time_Year') as 'Time_Year', coalesce(sum(m.'Data_Value'), 0) as 'A', coalesce(sum(x.'Data_Value'), 0) as 'B';d=foreach d generate Time_Year + "~~~" + Time_Week as 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week',A as 'Current Scan', B as 'Previous Scan';f = filter q by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; g = filter q by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"..  "current year - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];s = group f by ('Time_Week') full, g by ('Time_Week');s = foreach s generate coalesce(f.'Time_Week', g.'Time_Week') as 'Time_Week',first(f.'Time_Year', g.'Time_Year') as 'Time_Year', coalesce(sum(f.'Data_Value'), 0) as 'A', coalesce(sum(g.'Data_Value'), 0) as 'B';s=foreach s generate Time_Year + "~~~" + Time_Week as 'Time1_Year~~~Time1_Week',A as 'Current Scan 1', B as 'Previous Scan 1';j=union d,s;j=foreach j generate (case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum('Current Scan') else sum('Current Scan 1')  end) as 'Current Scan',(case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum('Previous Scan') else sum('Previous Scan 1')  end) as 'Previous Scan',(case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week' else 'Time1_Year~~~Time1_Week'  end) as 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week';

q = load "ScanData";q= filter q by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("Product")}};q = filter q by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("Market")}};q = filter q by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["DUE_DATE_Week"]).asEquality("Time_Week")}};q = filter q by 'Measure' == "Units";m = filter q by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in ["52 weeks ago".."current day"];x = filter q by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in  ["52 weeks ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"];d = group x by ('Time_Week') , m by ('Time_Week');d = foreach d generate coalesce(m.'Time_Week', x.'Time_Week') as 'Time_Week',first(m.'Time_Year', x.'Time_Year') as 'Time_Year', coalesce(sum(m.'Data_Value'), 0) as 'A', coalesce(sum(x.'Data_Value'), 0) as 'B';d=foreach d generate Time_Year + "~~~" + Time_Week as 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week',A as 'Current Scan', B as 'Previous Scan';f = filter q by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; g = filter q by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"..  "current year - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];s = group f by ('Time_Week') full, g by ('Time_Week');s = foreach s generate coalesce(f.'Time_Week', g.'Time_Week') as 'Time_Week',first(f.'Time_Year', g.'Time_Year') as 'Time_Year', coalesce(sum(f.'Data_Value'), 0) as 'A', coalesce(sum(g.'Data_Value'), 0) as 'B';s=foreach s generate Time_Year + "~~~" + Time_Week as 'Time1_Year~~~Time1_Week',A as 'Current Scan 1', B as 'Previous Scan 1';j=union d,s;j=foreach j generate (case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum('Current Scan') else sum('Current Scan 1')  end) as 'Current Scan',(case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum('Previous Scan') else sum('Previous Scan 1')  end) as 'Previous Scan',(case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week' else 'Time1_Year~~~Time1_Week'  end) as 'Time_Year~~~Time_Week';

q = load "QADInvoice_SnapshotDB_test"; q1 = group q by 'DUE_DATE_Year';q1 = foreach q1 generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' as 'DUE_DATE_Year', avg('DUE_DATE_Year_new') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear';q1 = order q1 by 'DUE_DATE_Year' desc;q1 = limit q1 1;q2 = filter q by  {{column(Time_Year_1.selection,["Time_Year"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE_Year")}};q2 = group q2 by 'DUE_DATE_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' as 'Date_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('DUE_DATE_Year_new') as 'avg_DueDateYear';u = union q1,q2;u = group u by all;u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DueDateYear')> 3000 then 0 else (sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*-365 end) as 'Day_Diff';

q = load "QADInvoice_SnapshotDB_test"; q1 = group q by 'DUE_DATE_Year'; q1 = foreach q1 generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' as 'DUE_DATE_Year', avg('DUE_DATE_Year_new') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear'; q1 = order q1 by 'DUE_DATE_Year' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(Time_Year_1.selection,["DUE_DATE_Year"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE_Year")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'DUE_DATE_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' as 'DUE_DATE_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('DUE_DATE_Year_new') as 'avg_DueDateYear'; u = union q1,q2; u = group u by all; u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DueDateYear')> 3000 then 1 else ((sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear')))+1 end) as 'Year_Diff';

q = load "QADInvoice_SnapshotDB_test"; q1 = group q by 'DUE_DATE_Year'; q1 = foreach q1 generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' as 'DUE_DATE_Year', avg('DueDateYear') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear'; q1 = order q1 by 'DUE_DATE_Year' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(Time_Year_1.selection,["Time_Year"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE_Year")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'DUE_DATE_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'DUE_DATE_Year' as 'DUE_DATE_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('DueDateYear') as 'avg_DueDateYear'; u = union q1,q2; u = group u by all; u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DueDateYear')> 3000 then 0 else (sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*52 end) as 'Week_Diff';

q = load "QADInvoice_SnapshotDB_test";  q = filter q by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("STATE1")}};  q = filter q by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["Time_Week"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE_Week")}};  q = filter q by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("PRODUCT_NAME")}};  q = filter q by 'STATE1' in ["ACT", "NSW", "QLD", "SA", "TAS", "VIC", "WA"];  a = filter q by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in ["current week - {{cell(CYWeekStart.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks".."current week - {{cell(CYWeekEnd.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks"];  a = group a by ('DUE_DATE_Week');  a = foreach a generate "Current 52 Weeks List" as 'Time Period', 'DUE_DATE_Week' as 'DUE_DATE_Week', sum('KG') as 'sum_EXT_PRICE';  r = filter q by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in ["current week - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks".."current week - {{cell(LYWeekEnd.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks"];  r = group r by ('DUE_DATE_Week');  r = foreach r generate "Last 52 Weeks List" as 'Time Period', 'DUE_DATE_Week' as 'DUE_DATE_Week', sum('KG') as 'sum_EXT_PRICE';  b = load "ScanData";  b = filter b by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("Market")}};  b = filter b by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["Time_Week"]).asEquality("Time_Week")}};  b = filter b by 'Measure' == "Conv Kgs";  b = filter b by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("Product")}};  t = filter b by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in ["current week - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks".."current week - {{cell(LYWeekEnd.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks"];  t = group t by ('Time_Week');  t = foreach t generate "Last 52 Weeks Scan" as 'Time Period', 'Time_Week' as 'DUE_DATE_Week', sum('Data_Value') as 'sum_EXT_PRICE';  x = filter b by date('Time_Year', 'Time_Month', 'Time_Day') in ["current week - {{cell(CYWeekStart.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks".."current week - {{cell(CYWeekEnd.result,0,"Week_Diff").asObject()}} weeks"];  x = group x by ('Time_Week');  x = foreach x generate "Current 52 Weeks Scan" as 'Time Period','Time_Week' as 'DUE_DATE_Week', sum('Data_Value') as 'sum_EXT_PRICE';  u = union a,r,t,x;  d = group u by ('DUE_DATE_Week', 'Time Period');  d = foreach d generate 'Time Period' as 'Time Period','DUE_DATE_Week' as 'DUE_DATE_Week', sum('sum_EXT_PRICE') as 'KG';

q = load "QADInvoice_SnapshotDB_test";q = filter q by {{column(Region_1_1.selection,["Region"]).asEquality("STATE1")}};q= filter q by {{column(PRODUCT_NAME_1.selection,["PRODUCT_NAME"]).asEquality("PRODUCT_NAME")}};q = filter q by {{column(Time_Week_1.selection,["DUE_DATE_Week"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE_Week")}}; m = filter q by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in ["52 weeks ago".."current day"];x = filter q by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in  ["52 weeks ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"];d = group m by ('DUE_DATE_Week') full , x by ('DUE_DATE_Week');d = foreach d generate coalesce(m.'DUE_DATE_Week', x.'DUE_DATE_Week') as 'DUE_DATE_Week',first(m.'DUE_DATE_Year', x.'DUE_DATE_Year') as 'DUE_DATE_Year', coalesce(sum(m.'EXT_PRICE_AUD'), 0) as 'A', coalesce(sum(x.'EXT_PRICE_AUD'), 0) as 'B';d=foreach d generate DUE_DATE_Year + "~~~" + DUE_DATE_Week as 'DUE_DATE_Year~~~DUE_DATE_Week',A as 'Current List', B as 'Previous List';f = filter q by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; g = filter q by date('DUE_DATE_Year', 'DUE_DATE_Month', 'DUE_DATE_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"..  "current year - {{cell(LYWeekStart.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];s = group f by ('DUE_DATE_Week') full, g by ('DUE_DATE_Week');s = foreach s generate coalesce(f.'DUE_DATE_Week', g.'DUE_DATE_Week') as 'DUE_DATE_Week',first(f.'DUE_DATE_Year', g.'DUE_DATE_Year') as 'DUE_DATE_Year', coalesce(sum(f.'EXT_PRICE_AUD'), 0) as 'A', coalesce(sum(g.'EXT_PRICE_AUD'), 0) as 'B';s=foreach s generate DUE_DATE_Year + "~~~" + DUE_DATE_Week as 'DUE_DATE1_Year~~~DUE_DATE1_Week',A as 'Current List 1', B as 'Previous List 1';j=union d,s;j=foreach j generate (case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum('Current List') else sum('Current List 1')  end) as 'Current List',(case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum('Previous List') else sum('Previous List 1')  end) as 'Previous List',(case when "{{cell(Time_Year_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then 'DUE_DATE_Year~~~DUE_DATE_Week' else 'DUE_DATE1_Year~~~DUE_DATE1_Week'  end) as 'DUE_DATE_Year~~~DUE_DATE_Week';

parameters.text: *total Scan does not include ice-cream, UHT or cream
